verses.verse: Israel,<WH3478> return<WH7725> to Yahweh<WH3068> your God;<WH430> for you have fallen<WH3782> because of your sin.<WH5771>

Take<WH3947> words<WH1697> with you,<WH7725> and return to Yahweh.<WH3068> Tell<WH559> him,<WH5375> "Forgive all our sins,<WH5771> and accept<WH3947> that which is good:<WH2896> so we offer<WH7999> our lips<WH8193> like bulls.<WH6499>

Assyria<WH804> can't<WH3467> save us.<WH7392> We won't ride on horses;<WH5483> neither will we say<WH559> any more to the work<WH4639> of our hands,<WH3027> <WH430> 'Our gods!' for in you the fatherless<WH3490> finds mercy.<WH7355>"
"I will heal<WH7495> their waywardness.<WH4878> I will love<WH157> them freely;<WH5071> for my anger<WH639> is turned away from him.<WH7725>
I will be like the dew<WH2919> to Israel.<WH3478> He will blossom<WH6524> like the lily,<WH7799> and send down<WH5221> his roots<WH8328> like Lebanon.<WH3844>
His branches<WH3127> will spread,<WH3212> and his beauty<WH1935> will be like the olive tree,<WH2132> and his fragrance<WH7381> like Lebanon.<WH3844>

Men will live<WH3427> in his shade.<WH6738> <WH7725> They will revive<WH2421> like the grain,<WH1715> and blossom<WH6524> like the vine.<WH1612> Their fragrance<WH2143> will be like the wine<WH3196> of Lebanon.<WH3844>

Ephraim,<WH669> what have I to do any more with idols?<WH6091> I answer,<WH6030> and will take care<WH7789> of him.<WH7488> I am like a green fir tree;<WH1265> from me your fruit<WH6529> is found.<WH4672>"

Who is wise,<WH2450> that he may understand<WH995> these things?<WH995> Who is prudent, that he may know<WH3045> them?<WH1870> For the ways of Yahweh<WH3068> are right,<WH3477> and the righteous<WH6662> walk<WH3212> in them;<WH6586> But the rebellious stumble in them.<WH3782>
